dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1974
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Meandering comments on anarchism, "worthy or unworthy" poor, usury, the Church, holy fools, the writer Solzhenitsyn, Cesar Chavez and the farmowrkers, and the Berrigan brothers.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 540 1974-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
